description: 1 x Pittosporum (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 5.00m. Thin crown density throughout by approximately 20%. Reduce re-growth since last prune back into main crown structure approximately 1.00m. Remove dead wood. General maintenance.1 x Acer (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 3.50m. Thin crown density by approximately 20%. Reduce crown by approximately 1.00m. Remove dead wood. General maintenance.1 x Cherry (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 5.00m. Thin crown density by approximately 20%. Reduce 2 x lateral limbs growing towards and over boundary hedge by approximately 1.00-1.50m. Reduce any remaining extraneous overlong branches back into main crown structure up to 1.00m to shape. Remove dead wood. General maintenance.1 x Chinese Privet (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 5.00m. Reduce up to 1.20m. Remove stems overhanging planting bed. To control encroachment.1 x Birch (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 7.00m. Thin crown density by 20%. Tip prune to reduce by approximately 1.25. Remove dead wood. Raise crown by 0.5-1.00m. To clear telephone lines/general maintenance.1 x Pittosporum (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately 2.250m. Fell to ground level and grind stump to approximately 300mm below current ground level. Poor quality and low amenity value.1 x Pittosporum (applicants ref. T7) - In hedge line: Trim as hard back as practicable whilst preserving leaf cover up to 30cm. General maintenance.
